caption: This song is vibrant, alive, exciting and fun. It features elements of inspiration from Latin and French music, as heard in the use of the flamenco guitar alongside the accordion.The song is suitable for dancing, and has a charming bounce to it. The initial part of the song builds up to the section that's most alive and layered.
